description:
A sensible person's answer is no, but who says that it's the case in our story? 
A mysterious Lorelai patriot is ready to do whatever it takes to make the town flourish. 
No one suspects anything wrong, but suddenly, familiars all over Lorelai start acting weird. 
Being an outstanding tamer, you come to the town to get to the root of the problem and help poor animals but learn that the disease is just the tip of the iceberg. 
Solve tricky puzzles, knotty problems, and figure out what's going on!
name: Spirits Chronicles: Flower of Hope Collector's Edition
